lua.luacheckPath.description:
Specifies the path to the luacheck binary (if not found on PATH).
Note: luacheck can be invoked via a .bat or a .exe file, depending on the version you have. Make sure you specify the correct one.

lua.preferLuaCheckErrors.description: Specifies whether to prefer luacheck errors over the standard luaparse errors if luacheck is available

lua.targetVersion.description: Specifies the target version of Lua

lua.format.lineWidth.description: Maximum length of a line before it will be wrapped

lua.format.useTabs.description: Force the formatter to use tabs over spaces. A value of null (default) indicates that editor settings should be used.

lua.format.indentCount.description: Number of spaces to indent. A value of null (default) indicates that editor settings should be used.

lua.format.singleQuote.description: Whether to use single or double quotes on strings. Defaults to double quotes

lua.format.linebreakMultipleAssignments.description: Whether to split multiple assignments onto separate lines. Defaults to false
